move.waypoint_progress_reward_per_step_note: Bonus applied each time a move reduces the Chebyshev distance to the current mission waypoint.
move.waypoint_regression_penalty_per_step_not: Penalty when a move increases the distance to the active waypoint (moving backward on the leg).
move.deadline_slack_bonus_note: Awarded if the move preserves or increases schedule slack relative to the waypoint's requested turn.
move.deadline_slack_penalty_note: Applied when the move causes the ETA to fall behind the waypoint deadline.
move.tolerance_bonus_note: Extra reward for entering the tolerance window around a waypoint endpoint.
move.unknown_tile_bonus_note: Exploration credit granted when stepping onto a tile the drone has not visited yet.
move.possible_target_bonus_note: Bonus for entering a tile marked as a possible target in intelligence reports.
move.figure_hint_bonus_note: Reward for moving where a figure hint (type/color) can be confirmed.
move.unknown_color_bonus_note: Encourages interacting with pieces whose color is still unknown.
move.unknown_neighbor_bonus_per_tile_note: Adds value for moves that expose adjacent tiles with unknown statuses.
move.board_edge_bias_bonus_note: Positive bias for hugging sector boundaries or the board perimeter (useful for coverage).
move.board_edge_bias_range_note: Number of tiles from the perimeter where the edge bias bonus remains active.
move.leg_travel_reward_note: Reward when the move advances along the current leg in its intended direction.
move.leg_travel_penalty_note: Penalty for drifting away from the leg corridor while it is the plan focus.
move.leg_sideways_reward_note: Encourages short lateral probes near the leg when scouting is helpful.
move.leg_sideways_inspection_bonus_note: Additional bonus for sideways moves that inspect nearby unknowns but stay close to the leg.
move.leg_along_penalty_note: Applied when a move travels along the leg axis but in the regressive/opposite direction.
move.leg_start_progress_reward_note: Reward for staging toward the beginning of a leg when not yet aligned with its start point.
move.leg_start_regression_penalty_note: Penalty for moving farther away from the leg start while still trying to stage to it.
move.sector_alignment_reward_note: Incentive for moves that reduce distance to the assigned coverage sector boundary.
move.sector_inside_bonus_note: Bonus once inside the assigned sector to reinforce staying within bounds.
move.sector_unknown_probe_bonus_note: Bonus granted only when the remaining slack is enough to visit the nearest unknown tile within the sector without delaying the next waypoint.
move.sector_unknown_probe_min_slack_note: Minimum spare turns required before encouraging sector probe moves toward unknown tiles.

prompt_requests.rationale: Rationale: Provide a rationale on how you want to use your turn to reach the game objective (Drone 1 on round 1 should explain the coverage plan and rendezvous).
prompt_requests.action: Action: What you want to do?
prompt_requests.action_move: Direction: If your action is to move, where you want to move?
prompt_requests.action_broadcast: Message: If your action is broadcast, describe the coverage assignments and rendezvous timing so every drone can update its plan. Only rebroadcast when co-located partners need an update (mandatory for Drone 1 on round 1).
prompt_requests.memory_update: Memory: Summarize everything worth remembering. Pretend that you lose all your previous memory and only have this memory after your turn.
